definition.text: Lets take a look at another example to let the notion of the constant feedback loop sink in before we move on!

paragraphs.text: This is the data structure where information about limit buy orders is kept.

Go to the Trading Engine layers manager on the charts (the second counting from the left). Scroll down and turn on the Limit Buy Orders layer. Now swipe the mouse pointer over a few of the buy orders and check the effect on the nodes on the design space.
Can you envision the implications of having this level of control over the data managed by the trading bot?
